name: react-flashcards
description: A simple Flashcard component using React and TypeScript.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run copy:css
scripts.copy:css: mkdir -p dist/cjs/components/FlashCardArray && mkdir -p dist/esm/components/FlashCardArray && mkdir -p dist/cjs/components/FlashCard && mkdir -p dist/esm/components/FlashCard && cp src/components/FlashCardArray/FLashCardArray.css dist/cjs/components/FlashCardArray && cp src/components/FlashCardArray/FLashCardArray.css dist/esm/components/FlashCardArray && cp src/components/FlashCard/Flashcard.css dist/cjs/components/FlashCard && cp src/components/FlashCard/Flashcard.css dist/esm/components/FlashCard

author: Vidhi Tomar
